backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented methods.
feature_evidence.json: Defines feature evidence entries mapping requirements to frontend files and components with high-confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten 1–2 sentence summaries for key frontend files including components, styles, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark color palettes and global styling tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML shell that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component rendering the PhysioTrackLanding page.
frontend/src/components/DailyCheckIn.tsx: Interactive check‑in form with sliders that computes a health score and displays personalized tips upon submission.
frontend/src/components/PhysioTrackLandi: Landing page with hero section, features overview, generated images, and optional daily check‑in flow.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for handling Internet Identity login, persistence, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file for future backend‑related React Query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and sets light/dark OKLCH color variables and base styles for the app.
frontend/src/lib/scoring.ts: Provides health score calculation logic and generates personalized tips based on daily check‑in data.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, custom colors from CSS variables, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s state, features, requirements, and image asset needs for the PhysioTrack app.
